si.title: සිරකරුවා
body_lines: මාතරා බන්ධනාගාරයේ සිරකරුවෙකු අද (20) තවත් සිරකරුවෙකුගේ මුහුණක් කපා ඇත.

en.title: Prisoner
body_lines: A prisoner at Matara Prison has cut down another prisoner's face today (20).

summary_lines: In a shocking incident at Matara Prison, one inmate severely injured another by cutting his face on April 20th.
